short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An AI toolbox built for scale. Klevere's AI executes multi-step workflows in seconds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Klevere is building an AI Toolbox across marketing, sales and HR to help teams 100X task execution and crush targets. Through our Chrome Extension, we display AI Tools that are specific to LinkedIn activity and every task can be bulk run.

In Sales:
- Create Personalized Connection Requests
- Create Ice-breakers for your leads
- Generate personalized cold emails
- Research prospect companies and much more

In Marketing:
- Create powerful LinkedIn posts
- Upload images to create LinkedIn post captions

In HR & Recruitment:
- Analyze candidate LinkedIn profiles to discover candidate fit.

All this and more on Klevere.ai. To scale, create a "new project" and bulk run the entire operation.
